product_name: Soleus GPS Draft Bike Computer - 2013 Overstock
long_description: If you want to know how fast, how far and how long you're riding, the Soleus GPS Draft bike computer tracks your speed, mileage and location and lets you upload the details via an integrated USB port. Wireless computer features GPS receivers that use satellites to track your location; computer stores up to 30 separate trips. Use the included USB cable to upload your rides to your home computer. Records trip distance and total mileage; stopwatch and lap timer let you test your speed against the clock. Soleus GPS Draft bike computer records your average and max speed while displaying your current speed. 5 programmable alarms keep you on schedule; backlight mode lets you see the screen even when it gets dark outside; computer is water-resistant. Overstock.
short_description: If you want to know how fast, how far and how long you're riding, the Soleus GPS Draft bike computer tracks your speed, mileage and location and lets you upload the details via an integrated USB port.
